hero.headline: Feel Connected. Every Day.
hero.sub: Tellie is your warm, friendly AI companion, ready to listen, chat, and make every day brighter.

why.title: Why Tellie?
why.copy: Loneliness is a public health issue. Tellie provides meaningful conversations, emotional support, and gentle companionship, whenever you need it.

points.title: Warm Conversations
points.copy: Friendly chats that feel human and compassionate.

points.title: Always Here
points.copy: Available 24/7, so you are never alone.

points.title: Private & Respectful
points.copy: Your conversations stay just between you and Tellie.

points.title: Emergency Support
points.copy: If Tellie notices you might need help, it gently alerts your chosen contact.

who.title: Who is it for?
who.copy: Tellie is for those moments when the house feels too quiet and the days feel too long. When you wish you had someone to share your thoughts. Tellie is here to listen and remind you that you matter.

steps.title: 1. Get Started
steps.copy: Create your profile in just a few minutes.

steps.title: 2. Start Chatting
steps.copy: Say hello to your new companion, available anytime you want to talk.

steps.title: 3. Feel Connected
steps.copy: Enjoy meaningful conversations that brighten your day.

blocks.title: Why We Exist
blocks.copy: We started Tellie because too many people were going days without a single meaningful conversation. We believe no one deserves to feel invisible.

blocks.title: Our Mission
blocks.copy: To create technology that feels human, warm, understanding, and genuinely caring. Our mission is to make every person feel heard, valued, and connected.

blocks.title: What We Believe
blocks.copy: We believe in dignity, kindness, and the simple power of a conversation. No matter your age, your stories matter.

blocks.title: Our Promise
blocks.copy: We promise to be here every day to help you feel less alone. Because connection isn’t just important, it’s everything.

signup.title: Get Early Access
signup.copy: Be among the first to experience Tellie. Sign up below.
signup.success: Thank you! We'll be in touch soon.
